channel.title: DDS help please
channel.description:
hey guys, i was toggling with some codes and iwas trying to copy a code that would make the dds be like in rs... like in the video the red lines are on target... [URL=http://s268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/?action=view&current=dds.flv][IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/th_dds.jpg[/img][/URL] but when i changed the codes on my source and tried to compile it i got this. [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/lawl-1-1-1.gif[/img] it says "gfx100(252, absy, abx) <- thats the error...
any help would be great
- Thanks, Gh0st Jr

item.title: DDS help please
item.dc:creator: @twang_2 twang 2
item.description:
@twang_2 wrote:

have u got gfx100 declared in player.java? if so, use “gfx100(252, absy, abx)” as : “gfx100(252)”

Read full topic

item.title: DDS help please

item.description:
